p: In Figure 1, labels R1, R2 and R3 represent the carbon chains from triacylglycerols, R4 represents the carbon chains of the alcohol applied for the transesterification reaction. Depending on the global region, availability and costs, other alcohols can be applied for biodiesel production, mainly ethanol, propanol and butanol, which will generate, respectively, products labeled as FAEE, FAPE and FABE. Table 1 presents the summarized acronyms for mono alkyl esters of a long chain.
